name: df-r1p
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cr1p, cmpt(s0, universe, csb(s1, cfv(cbs, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0))), cmpo(s2, s3, cv(s1), cv(s1), co(cv(s2), cfv(csg, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0))), co(co(cv(s2), cfv(cq1p, cv(s0)), cv(s3)), cfv(cmulr, cfv(cpl1, cv(s0))), cv(s3)))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ rem1p =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[(Base `(Poly1 ` s0))/ s1](s2 ‚àà s1, s3 ‚àà s1 ‚Ü¶(s2[(-g `(Poly1 ` s0))]((s2[(quot1p ` s0)]s3)[(√ó `(Poly1 ` s0))]s3))))
comment: Define the remainder after dividing two univariate polynomials. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 28-Mar-2015.)
